title: Programmers Watch Face
summary: Programmers is a simple watch face for programming geeks who uses Android Wear.
description: Programmers is a simple yet elegant watch face for us programming geeks who uses an Android Wear device. Rather than showing the numbers 1 to 12, the watch face displays the names of more or less well-known programming languages.Features:- Watch face for Android Wear Devices (G Watch R, Moto 360, SmartWatch 3, etc.)- Support for both round and square screens- Displays information about: time, date and remaining clock battery- Burn-in protection for OLED screens (in ambient mode)- Settings for background color and number of languages shown in ambient modeHow to use:1. When you install the app, the watch face will be automatically transferred to your watch (sometime there's a delay getting the watch face on the watch from your phone, i recommend a bit of patience if its not instantaneous for you).2. From watch: Long press your watch face and select the one named "Programmers".From mobile: Run the “Android Wear” app and tap “More” button in the watchface section. Select the watch face named "Programmers".3. Change settings.From watch: Long press your watch face and tap on the settings icon below the watch face preview in the watch face picker.From mobile: Run the "Android wear" app and tap on the watch face icon.
descriptionHTML:
Programmers is a simple yet elegant watch face for us programming geeks who uses an Android Wear device. Rather than showing the numbers 1 to 12, the watch face displays the names of more or less well-known programming languages.

Features:
- Watch face for Android Wear Devices (G Watch R, Moto 360, SmartWatch 3, etc.)
- Support for both round and square screens
- Displays information about: time, date and remaining clock battery
- Burn-in protection for OLED screens (in ambient mode)
- Settings for background color and number of languages shown in ambient mode

How to use:
1. When you install the app, the watch face will be automatically transferred to your watch (sometime there's a delay getting the watch face on the watch from your phone, i recommend a bit of patience if its not instantaneous for you).

2. From watch: Long press your watch face and select the one named "Programmers".
From mobile: Run the “Android Wear” app and tap “More” button in the watchface section. Select the watch face named "Programmers".

3. Change settings.
From watch: Long press your watch face and tap on the settings icon below the watch face preview in the watch face picker.
From mobile: Run the "Android wear" app and tap on the watch face icon.
recentChanges: - Changes in burn in protection to better prevent burn in on OLED screens.
-- Removed meters from watch face when in ambient mode on an OLEAD screen.
-- Changed color on graphics in ambient mode (on an OLEAD screen) to a darker color instead of white.
-- Increased random offset for graphics from 4 pixels to 8 pixels in ambient mode on an OLEAD screen.
